properties.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 2:07PM PST until February 6 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt Range.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel and recreations could be very
difficult in and around the Ruby Mountains due to blowing and
drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY
